item.title: SysBench ShardingSphere-Proxy Empty Rule Performance Test
item.description: Objectives Compare the performance of ShardingSphere-Proxy and MySQL Sysbench directly carries out stress testing on the performance of MySQL. Sysbench directly carries out stress testing on ShardingSphere-Proxy (directly connect MySQL). Based on the above two groups of experiments, we can figure out the loss of MySQL when using ShardingSphere-Proxy. Set up the test environment Server information Db-related configuration: it is recommended that the memory is larger than the amount of data to be tested, so that the data is stored in the memory hot block, and the rest can be adjusted.
